community.sub: teachers rate "Three Cubes" educational content for formal education as "good" and "very good"!

slide01.review: The Great School Concept points out adventures in school. Game-based learning is a great method to reach to academic results!

slide02.review: The students are included in practical, creative activities – thus their motivation to learn is getting stronger

slide03.review: These lessons develop children’s competencies, like creativity, technological intuition, critical thinking, abilities to solve problems individually and in teams

cardLeft.desc: In 2020 we won the 1st place in category "Learning and education" in a national competition

cardRight.desc: In 2020 we were selected as one of the 16 best digital solutions in Europe

orderNow.main: US schools are using "First Humans on Mars" course in their formal education!

inter-card.title:
National Education Agency website:
www.mokykla2030.lt states following:
inter-card.desc: "Curriculum update follows the approach launched in the 2008 programs, but the concept of competence itself has been developed and refined. It also seeks to reveal the links between subject content and competences and to illustrate how competencies are developed through subject content"

cardLeft.desc: Developed following updated general education curriculum

cardMiddle.desc: Interactivity provides access to knowledge in a variety of forms

cardRight.desc: Attention is focused on the development of students' competencies

slide01.desc: The shortage of abilieties to work in teams, patience and achieving results really came to light during exercises. The experience of "Three Cubes" lessons are very useful for developing these competencies.

slide02.desc: During these lessons children feel safe – they are not afraid to make a mistake or not know something.

keyBenefits.title: According to a survey, teachers who use "Three Cubes" lessons state that it improves…

mars.title: The First Humans on Mars
mars.sub: Create the first cosmic base on planet Mars!

themes.title: Topics of lessons
themes.theme3: supplying the bases with energy, by using sun and wind power stations;
themes.theme4: learning how to obtain fertilizers and grow food;
themes.theme5: creating new stories, myths and legends for the people generation in Mars;
themes.sub: There is no individual registration for lessons.

gameDesign.title: Game design with "Minecraft"
gameDesign.desc: The kids become the crew of the colony spaceship, solving various tasks together with the ship control robot and thus learning about game design!

sub.text: For individual registration visit "CodeAcademy Kids"

first.desc: Game design and game development basics

third.desc: Applying learned theoretical and practical knowledge by developing a game

marsPackage.title: Organizations that get interactive "Three Cubes" lessons are provided with

ecology.title: Informal education in United Kingdom
ecology.text1: Modules of different themes let children improve knowledge on various topics, e.g. Carbon Monoxide, Climate Change.
ecology.text2: Learn about Carbon Monoxide in a safe virtual environment in "Minecraft" and Climate Change during an interactive expedition in Antarctica!
ecology.text3: Students solve exercises individually and in teams.
ecology.text4: Students and schools in United Kingdom have started these interactive lessons with "Minecraft"

mars.title: Formal education in the United States
mars.text1: The course "First Humans on Mars" can aim to improve knowledge on mathematics, biology, chemistry, geography and astronomy.
mars.text2: The course consist of virtual Mars world and interactive exercises for students.
mars.text3: Students solve exercises individually and collaborating in teams.
mars.text4: Schools in the United States use "Three Cubes" lessons in their formal education.

gigaF.title: TESLA Gigafactory 2 with "Minecraft"
gigaF.text1: "Tesla" has shared the video of the project in it's official "Twitter" account, saying that "Lithuania knows the way to our hearts".
gigaF.text2: During "Gigaton" a team has came up with an idea to build "Tesla Gigafactory 2" in "Minecraft".
gigaF.text3: Students solve exercises individually and collaborating in teams.
gigaF.text4: Students and schools in the United Kingdom use "Three Cubes" lessons with "Minecraft".
gigaF.text5: The video of the project has gained over 260,000 views on "Youtube".

Vilnius.title: Lithuania related projects
Vilnius.text1: We recreated historical Vilnius in 5 different epochs.
Vilnius.text2: We rebuilt one of the most important Vilnius places: Gediminas Castle Tower, The Cathedral Square, National Museum - Palace of the Grand Dukes of Lithuania and the surrounding territory.
Vilnius.text3: "Minecraft" builders consisted of students in schools and universities.
Vilnius.text4: 10 different Vilnius schools have tried out the maps with VR!
Vilnius.text5: The video of the project gained over 40,000 views on "Youtube" platformoje.

3kids.title: Three students
3kids.text1: 3 educational adventures for improving knowledge on Lithuania's history.
3kids.text2: Educational adventure themes: "Rescuing Vytis", "The Teasure of the Dukes" ir "The Act of Independence".
3kids.text3: Some voices of the characters' are recorded by well-known people in Lithuania - Gabrielius Liaudanskas-Svaras and Liudas Mažylis.
3kids.text4: Educational adventures can be downloaded and used for free
3kids.text5: The video of the project has gained over 12,000 views on "Youtube".

gedas.title: Improve Gediminas with "Minecraft"
gedas.text1: Just in 3 days 12 builders of "Three Cubes" have managed to creatively recreate Vilnius territory from 2,300,000 blocks during livestrem.
gedas.text2: Together with telecom organisation "Labas", "Three Cubes" has came up with a project to creatively recreate Gediminas Castle Tower.
gedas.text3: The main architect of building with "Minecraft" was youtuber and "Three Cubes" Co-Founder Darius Kniūkšta.
gedas.text4: The event moderator was Orijus Gasanovas, comedians Mantas Katleris and Mantas Bartuševičius, historian Aurimas Švedas joined the livestream.
gedas.text5: The video of the project has gained over 155,000 views on "Facebook".

news.title: Naujienos
news.cardMain1: Lietuvos mokyklose pamokos pradėjo vykti per "Minecraft".
news.cardMain2:
Kompiuteriniai žaidimai vietoje pamokų?
Idėja laimėjo 20 000 eurų.
news.cardMain3: Lietuviui pomėgis žaisti kompiuterinius žaidimus tapo profesija.
news.cardMain4: Kitas lygis. Tinklalaidė apie žaidimų industriją Lietuvoje.
news.cardAll1: "Trys kubai" pristatymas LR Seime apie mokymąsi su "Minecraft"
news.cardAll2: "Trys kubai" įgytas sertifikatas, atliktus "Minecraft" edukacinės platformos kursus Briuselyje "Microsoft" ofise
news.cardAll5: "Trys kubai" salė su "Minecraft" projektais, turinio kūrėjais ir pristatymais apie "Youtube" renginyje "GameOn 2017"
news.cardAll6: "Trys kubai" stendas su "Minecraft" turnyru, turinio kūrėjais ir diskusijomis renginyje "Comic Con Baltics 2017"
news.cardAll7: "Trys kubai" stendas su "Minecraft" edukaciniais nuotykiais parodoje "Mokykla 2019"
news.cardAll8: "Hour of Code" renginys rengtas kartu su "Microsoft" ir MO muziejumi

For any questions feel free to contact gabriele@tryskubai.lt

gdpr.title: We value your privacy
gdpr.desc: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience and analyze our traffic. By clicking "Accept All", you consent to our use of cookies.

info.title: Description
info.lang: This site use this cookie to remember a user's language settings.
info.github: The websites host (GitHub Inc.) loggs and stores your IP adress. (their privacy policy).
info.mailer: This site use this cookie to determine if a website visitor has seen newsletter pop-up or not, and whether or not to show the pop-up again according to your behavior settings.
info.ga: The _ga cookie, installed by Google Analytics, calculates visitor, session, and also keeps track of site usage for the site's analytics report. The cookie stores information anonymously and assigns a randomly generated number to recognize unique visitors..
info.gaID: The _ga_container-ID cookie, installed by Google Analytics is used to persist session state.

preference.title: Customize Consent Preferences
preference.desc1: We use cookies to help you navigate efficiently and perform certain functions. You will find detailed information about all cookies under each consent category below.
preference.desc2: The cookies that are categorized as "Necessary" are stored on your browser as they are essential for enabling the basic functionalities of the site

necessary.title: Necessary
necessary.desc: Necessary cookies are required to enable the basic features of this site, such as providing services or saving visitor's language preference. These cookies do not store any personally identifiabl data.

functional.title: Functional
functional.desc: Functional cookie help perform functionality of third-party feature.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.desc: Analytical cookies are used to understand how visitors interact with the website. These cookies help provide information on metrics such as the number of visitors, traffic source, etc.

notice.title: Here's your cookies settings
notice.info: In order to subscribe to our newsletter, you need to customize your cookies settings first.
notice.desc: Press Blinking Cookie, then "Customize" and Enable "Functional" cookie or you can "Accept All" settings.
